title: The Night Within Us
description: "Is he my destiny or is he my doom?  ♫♪ Original Book Soundtrack "Naked" - Anto & Infy ♫♪  There are some prisons which have no bars. Amkaya’s dungeon is loneliness, because her proximity is fatal. A half-blood vampire, she cannot control the beast inside and long since gave up hope of a love affair - until she meets Noah, a Nephilim, whose embrace is also fatal. They cannot escape their extraordinary attraction to one another; they quickly and unexpectedly grow close - but is it a fateful encounter or fatal recklessness?
author: Sylvie Grohne
